review: The Fire Stick is a great concept and a nice alternative to the expense of cable television. The only ongoing issue that we seem to be suffering from is that Sling keeps prompting for the software to be updated but it says it has the latest version. The software has not been updated since (I believe March) and Sling TV keeps locking up and/or crashing. This has been rather irritating and I am hoping the software is updated soon so eliminate this problem. Other than that, it's great. There are new shows being added regularly to diversify viewing options for every kind of taste. I see this as being the future of television.
